transArray.content: The sanitary environment is very good

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Thank you very much for your recognition of the hotel room and the room lady. You gave us the recognition of environmental hygiene in your text review and gave you a 4-point rating in the score, which proves that we still have room for improvement. We will work hard to create a clean and comfortable stay environment for our guests. We also hope that you can see our progress next time you stay. At the same time, if you are not satisfied with anything during your stay, you can contact us at any time and we will help you solve it as soon as possible. , all the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your next stay, thank you! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
